#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int k,n;
		string s;
		cin>>s>>k;
		int l=s.length(),fl=0,fl1=0,sum=0,val=0,fl2=0;
		if((s[l-1]-48)%2==0)
		{
			fl=1;
		}
		for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
		{
			sum+=(s[i]-48);
		}
		if((sum%3)==0)
		{
			fl1=1;
		}
		if((sum%9)==0)
		fl2=1;
		if(k==1)
		{
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
		}
		if(k==2)
		{
			if(fl==1)
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
			else cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		}
		if(k==3)
		{
			if(fl1==1)
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
			else cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		}
		if(k==6)
		{
			if(fl==1 && fl1==1)
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
			else cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		}
		if(k==4)
		{
			int sum=0;
			int c=1;
				for(int i=l-1;i>=l-2;i--)
				{
					sum+=(s[i]-48)*c;
					c*=10;
				}
				if((sum%4)==0)
				cout<<"YES"<<endl;
				else
				cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		}
		if(k==5)
		{
			if(s[l-1]=='0' || s[l-1]=='5')
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
			else
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		}
		if(k==10)
		{
			if(s[l-1]=='0')
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
			else
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		}
		if(k==7)
		{
			if(l<3)
			{
				int sum=0;
				int c=1;
				for(int i=l-1;i>=0;i--)
				{
					sum+=(s[i]-48)*c;
					c*=10;
				}
				if((sum%7)==0)
				cout<<"YES"<<endl;
				else
				cout<<"NO"<<endl;
			}
			else
			{
				int i,j,k,c=0;
				j=l-3;
			//	cout<<j<<endl;
				int fl=0,ans=0;
				while(j>=0)
				{
					k=j;
					c=0;
					char buf[5];
					while(c<3)
					{
						buf[c]=s[k];
						k++;
						c++;
					}
					buf[c]='\0';
					int num=atoi(buf);
					if(fl==0)
					{
						ans+=num;
						fl=1;
					}
					else
					{
						ans-=num;
						fl=0;
					}
				//	cout<<num<<endl;
					j-=3;
				}
				char buf1[5];
				for(i=0;i<(l%3);i++)
				{
					buf1[i]=s[i];
				}
				buf1[i]='\0';
				int val1=atoi(buf1);
				//cout<<val1<<endl;
				if(fl==0)
				{
					ans+=val1;
					fl=1;
				}
				else
				{
					ans-=val1;
					fl=0;
				}
				if((ans%7)==0)
				cout<<"YES"<<endl;
				else
				cout<<"NO"<<endl;
			}
		}
		if(k==8)
		{
			int sum=0;
			int c=1;
			for(int i=l-1;i>=l-3;i--)
			{
				sum+=(s[i]-48)*c;
				c*=10;
			}
			if((sum%8)==0)
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
			else
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		}
		if(k==9)
		{
			if(fl2==1)
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
			else
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
